title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Supplemental Tutoring for Foundational Mathematics Competency in Timor-Leste

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computational skills and understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Achieve over 60% improvement in learning outcomes in statistics and geometry via supplemental tutoring programs
Cultivate the ability to apply over five mathematical concepts through weekly small-group activities (3 sessions/week)
Improve problem-solving skills by 40% through integration of digital worksheets and traditional pedagogical methods
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
